Name: Great Wall of China
Description: The Great Wall of China - Ancient fortification stretching over 13,000 miles. One of the most photographed landmarks in China and the world.

Name: Forbidden City
Description: Forbidden City - Imperial palace complex in Beijing. One of the most photographed historic sites in China.

Name: Terracotta Army
Description: Terracotta Army - Collection of terracotta sculptures depicting armies of Qin Shi Huang. One of the most photographed archaeological sites in China.

Name: Old Town of Lijiang
Description: Old Town of Lijiang - Ancient Naxi town with traditional architecture. One of the most photographed historic towns in China.

Name: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park
Description: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park - Stunning sandstone pillars and mountains. One of the most photographed natural landscapes in China.

Name: Mount Fuji
Description: Mount Fuji - Japan's highest peak and iconic symbol. One of the most photographed mountains in the world.

Name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
Description: Fushimi Inari Shrine - Famous for thousands of vermillion torii gates. One of the most photographed shrines in Japan.

Name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove

Name: Himeji Castle

Name: Banaue Rice Terraces
